name: Display Photonic Systems
overview: Display Photonic Systems, Inc. (DPS) is engaging in developing, manufacturing, and licensing advanced projection technologies. DPS has developed a proprietary Angular Color Projection technology for ultra portable, highly efficient projection display. Angular Color Projection technology combined the advantage of 3-panel projection system and single panel projection system. It is an enabling technology for a compact low cost (street price) high performance micro-projector system. The ultimate goal is to integrate the projection system into a smart cellular phones and other portable devices for instant sharing of information anywhere and anytime.

milestones.description: Display Photonic Systems Inc. and GEO Semiconductor Inc. Announce Partnership for the Creation of Advanced Micro-Projector Technology
milestones.source_description: Display Photonic Systems Inc. and GEO Semiconductor Inc. Announce Partnership for the Creation of Advanced Micro-Projector Technology
